articles.author: Leafly Podcasts
articles.text:
What Are You Smoking? features Leafly experts Will Hyde and Bailey Rahn, as well as guests from all corners of the cannabis industry reviewing strains, test-firing products, offering up pro tips, and answering your toughest cannabis questions.
Leafly Podcast
What Are You Smoking?
Episode 38: Perfecting Pre-Rolls With Saints Joints Founder Larry Perigo

In this episode: 
This week on What Are You Smoking, Will and Bailey sit down with Larry Perigo, a founder of Saints Joints, one of our favorite pre-rolls that, not coincidentally, comes in one of our favorite packages.

We talk about collaboration in the cannabis industry, the trials of expanding a cannabis company across state lines, and the challenges of developing the perfect blend of products for a concentrate-infused pre-roll. Plus, Larry passes on some joint-rolling advice for the DIY-inclined.

If you’ve got questions for our hosts, guests you’d like to hear, or have anything else to say about the show, email us at whatareyousmoking@leafly.com.
Want to listen to previous episodes of the show? Find them here!
And if you’re enjoying the show, we really appreciate you subscribing, rating, and reviewing it on iTunes or wherever you get your podcasts.
Strains & Products on This Episode:
  Fruit Brute by Saints Joints






 #Repost @daddybonglegs ・・・ Feeling like a true brute today💪 This here is Fruit Brute 🍇🍓🍒 A savage strain out of the gardens of @saintsjoints  @saints_joints  For all you 'Fruity Pebbles' lovers; this terpene profile is sure to perk your ears up! 🐶🌿💨 #saintsjoints #saints #sgb #seattlegreenbud #fruitbrute 🌊🌊🌊🌊🌊

 The #Frankenstein here to help your Monday feel like a #Friday #seattlesprivatereserve #frankenstein #smokespr #heavyhitter #indicahybrid #cannabis

 #Repost @onjha ・・・ Happy 4/20 eve my fellow cannababes! Have you stocked up all the way for the best holiday of be year? Feel like you forgot something? It just might be one of these exclusive and unreal Infused blunts! My two favorite companies in the industry have partnered to bring you just  what you need to make sure your holiday is lit!
A post shared by  Saints Joints (@saintsjoints) on Apr 19, 2018 at 9:58pm PDT



Meet Your Show Hosts
Bailey Rahn is an editor at Leafly specializing in cannabis strains and health. When she’s not at Leafly, you’ll likely find her smoking her way up a mountain or playing dress-up with her cats.

Will Hyde is a subject matter expert, strain specialist, and digital producer at Leafly. He spends his free time traveling and exploring creative outlets as a DJ, digital artist, and film producer.

About Our Music:
Music for “What Are You Smoking” is provided by Lusine. “Ticking Hands” is from his album Sensorimotor. “Two Dots” is from A Certain Distance. For more about Lusine, check out Ghostly.com.
articles.title: What Are You Smoking? Episode 38: Perfecting Pre-Rolls With the Saints Joints Founder

articles.author: Kayla Williams
articles.text:
Based on submissions made by Leafly users, we've added Frankenstein, Lavender Jones, Purple Paralysis, Space Jill, and Sugar Kush to the Leafly Explorer. Keep 'em coming! Also, we've got plently more new strains on the way, so stay tuned. In the meantime, leave a strain review if you've had the chance to try any of these new varieties, and let us know which strains you'd love for us to add next so we can make sure we don't forget any of your favorites!
1. Frankenstein
Characteristics of Frankenstein:

80% indica
Unknown lineage
Recommended for consumers with a high cannabis tolerance or patients with severe symptoms
Genetics gave rise to Opal OG Kush, Copper Kush, Sweet Lafayette, and OG's Pearl

2. Lavender Jones
Characteristics of Lavender Jones:

Hybrid strain
Cross between Casey Jones and Purple Urkle
Buds express themselves in vibrant hues of purple and green
Can bring deep relaxation paired with dreamy cerebral euphoria
Indoor flowering time of 7 to 8 weeks

3. Purple Paralysis
Characteristics of Purple Paralysis:

Sativa-dominant hybrid
Also known as Jellyfish Bud
Cross between Power Plant and Lavender
Breeder: Cream of the Crop
Hashy lavender aroma
Has potently energizing effects
Indoor flowering time of about 67 days

4. Space Jill
Characteristics of Space Jill:

70% sativa strain
Cross between Romulan and Cinderella 99
Recreation of the Space Queen strain
Breeder: TGA Genetics
Sweet mango and candy aroma
Can bring high-energy, creative, productive effects

5. Sugar Kush
Characteristics of Sugar Kush:

Indica-dominant strain
Cross between Kandy Kush and Hash Plant
Indoor flowering time of 9 weeks
articles.title: New Strains Alert: Frankenstein, Lavender Jones, Purple Paralysis, Space Jill, and Sugar Kush

description: Frankenstein is an 80% indica strain whose parents are unknown. Its potency is a talking point among patients and veteran consumers alike, who cherish this indica’s ability to push past the ceiling of their tolerance.
descriptionPlain: Frankenstein is an 80% indica strain whose parents are unknown. Its potency is a talking point among patients and veteran consumers alike, who cherish this indica’s ability to push past the ceiling of their tolerance.

highlightedReviews.text: Doesn't look like it is all that, But it kicks your a#$. Smell is pungent and brings memories of the good ol days. Highly potent. Stay at home and enjoy !

I liked this relativity potent indica. It has a nice floral and earthy aroma. It makes you feel relaxed and content. It's great for chilling out at home in the evening or on the weekend. I'd buy it again.

name: Frankenstein
